code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import SplashScreen from'./SplashScreen';import HomeScreen from'./HomeScreen';import ExperimentationScreen from'./ExperimentationScreen';import MissionsScreen from'./MissionsScreen';import TheoreticalGuide from'./TheoreticalGuide';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[screen,setScreen]=useState('splash');const[showGuide,setShowGuide]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(screen==='splash'){const timer=setTimeout(()=>{setScreen('home');},3000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);}},[screen]);const renderScreen=()=>{switch(screen){case'splash':return _jsx(SplashScreen,{onGetStarted:()=>setScreen('home')});case'home':return _jsx(HomeScreen,{onSelectMode:mode=>setScreen(mode)});case'experiment':return _jsx(ExperimentationScreen,{onBack:()=>setScreen('home'),onShowGuide:()=>setShowGuide(true)});case'missions':return _jsx(MissionsScreen,{onBack:()=>setScreen('home')});default:return null;}};return _jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[renderScreen(),showGuide&&_jsx(TheoreticalGuide,{onClose:()=>setShowGuide(false)})]});};export default App;
